data.price: (موسا) فەرمووی زانیاری ئەوە لای پەروەردگارمە لە پەراوێکدایە پەروەردگارم ھیچی لێ وون نابێت و ھیچی لەبیر ناچێت
data.arabic: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى

meta.transliteration: qāla ʿil'muhā ʿinda rabbī fī kitābin lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

dua.name: Dua for Inner Contentment
dua.significanceReason: Seeks understanding and acceptance of divine decree, promoting inner peace and contentment.

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
